title: Question about the website
body: Recently now when I open the main home page (while I am logged in) it shows me a bunch of new player guides. Is there anyway I can go back to the page that doesn't show me all these links.

replies.body:
It's not possible to change the featured content on the landing page of League's site. Currently, the new guides are there to showcase some big changes we've made in introducing new players to League! 

Sticking to the news page that *Hyperion3182* mentioned is a good way to see what news it out, without having to visit the main landing page. Let me know if this cleared it up for you.
Ok, Thank you! That seems to make sense then!

Hum, if you want to stick to most recent news, that's the address:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news
